casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Kevin WRIGHT, Defendant-Petitioner. C-260 September Term 2017
079938 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 26, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000791-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
